Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a pale red-grey pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393980) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393980)
